resources.string: Health news and apps about health and related process.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectur, adpiscing elit.

In compliance with the provisions of Regulation (EU) 2016/679 General Data Protection and other related regulations, the Andalusian Health Service (SAS), as responsible for the treatment, informs you that the data obtained through this application, hereinafter "Salud Andalucía", will be processed in order to manage its relationship with the Andalusian public health service (personal communications, health evaluations, professional follow-up, recommendations, etc.). 

 Your data will be backed up on our own servers or under our control, and may be processed by service providers as data processors, not providing data communications to third parties except those legally established. You can exercise your rights of access, rectification, opposition, deletion or any other recognized, through it application or as indicated in the extended information *.

 You can consult any question related to the protection of your personal data through the email address dpd.sspa@juntadeandalucia.es. If you agree to the above, click the "I agree" button to continue.

 (*) https://www.sspa.juntadeandalucia.es/servicioandaluzdesalud/politica-de-privacidad
You can find it in your card
Health Id Card is composed of AN and 10 digits
The identification document is not valid
According to the defined protocol, you can perform the test again from %1$s.
In order to send the questionnaire you must have answered all the questions
An error occurred. Please, try it again later.
An error occurred. Please, try it again later.
Once accepted, the questionnaire will be registered and cannot be modified or deleted. Are you sure of the recorded information?
Once accepted, the survey will remain registered and cannot be modified or deleted. Are you sure of the registered information?
You appear in our database as a person with specially protected data, so you cannot use online services by identifying yourself only with personal data.
The data entered is not valid. Please check with your health center how to correct them.

To complete your identification it is necessary that you have a contact mobile phone in the Andalusian Health Service user database. Please, check your file on the ClicSalud+ website or consult your health center
Recall information for the COVID-19 self-assessment

Depending on the current protocol, and in case you need it, you can already carry out a new COVID-19 self-evaluation.
Verification code has been sent to your phone by SMS. Enter code to continue.

There is an error starting session. Please, try it again later.
There is an error in the data entered. Please review them and try again.
The inserted code is wrong. Please enter a correct verification code
Check this box to save your data and use it next time

Add your phone number and we send you a SMS with a verification code
Insert the verification code we sent you via SMS
You have reached the maximum number of attempts to verify your phone number at this login. Please confirm the phone number and try again later.
¿Are you sure you want to disable notifications?
Due to background restrictions, your phone may not receive some notifications. Would you like to change it?
There was an error disabling notifications. Try later
The result of your last auto-test may suggest a coronavirus positive. Most people shows no symptoms and can stay at home. System has created a phone appointment and a doctor will contact you soon:
Remind that this free phone number is available about coronavirus information: 900400061. If your breathing problem goes severe or you have any other emergency, please contact your ER phone number.

In this section you will be able to activate communication from the Andalusian Public Health System.\nThanks to the activation of the different types of notifications on your mobile phone, you will be able to access a constantly growing set of services.

The COVID EUDigital Certificate, valid in the member states of the European Union, certifies that a person has been vaccinated, has performed a negative test or has recovered from COVID-19. More information
COVID-19 vaccination certificate valid in Andalusian.
This certificate, valid only in Andalusia, is issued in the cases of people who have registered a clinical contraindication for the vaccine
The vaccination certificate is shown when a vaccine authorized in the European Union has been administered, indicating whether or not the vaccination schedule has been completed.
It is issued after passing COVID-19, diagnosed by PCR test, and lasts for 180 days, counting from the date of the initial positive result.
It includes the result of tests based on PCR or antigen tests and will be valid according to the time frame defined for each of the tests.
Do you want to cancel your appointment?
An unexpected error occurred canceling the appointment. Please try again later.

The session could not be created. Confirm that the code entered is correct. If the error persists, start your identification process again by requesting a new QR code on the web https://sspa.lajunta.es/msaludautenticacion
You are trying to log in with an expired QR code. Please request a new QR code on the web https://sspa.lajunta.es/qrmovil
You appear with an Andalusian health card, please use the general access with personal data to have access to all the services.
You need an electronic certificate installed on your device to prove your identity using this option
You need an electronic certificate installed on your device to prove your identity using this option

This option may validate a COVID-19 vaccination certificate issued by the Andalusian Public Health System for Citizenship (more info).

There is no evidence in our records that any vaccine against COVID-19 has been administered to him. More Info.
The results of tests based on PCR or tests for COVID-19 antigens in the period of validity do not appear in our records. More Info.
His recovery from COVID-19 after a positive PCR less than 180 days ago is not in our records. More Info.
You are listed as under 16 in our system. To obtain your certificate, your Social Security holder must access to ClicSalud+ and download it. More Info.
It was not possible to access the information requested due to technical problems. We apologize for the inconvenience and suggest that you try access again after a while.
You are trying to access functionality that is not available in this version of the application. To access you must update the application. Do you wish to continue?
Start your new follow-up by answering the following questions
Begin your new follow-up by answering the following questions.
Please do a new follow-up with the guideline indicated by the nurse.
An error occurred while submitting the questionnaire responses
Please do a new follow-up with the guideline indicated by the healthcare professional.

To access this functionality, you need to increase the level of security in identification. Do you wish to continue?
Your session has expired. You must log in again to continue.
The selected electronic certificate is not a valid certificate to prove your identity
To identify with other methods of available, the current session is necessary. Do you wish to continue?
You are trying to access a section that contains protected personal data. Please confirm your credentials to continue.
At this time, you do not have a COVID-19 certificate stored. You can save the certificates from the display screen of the same by clicking on \"Store in the App\".
It was not possible to obtain the information to perform the verification. Please try again later.
The maximum number of attempts has been exceeded. For security, the active session is closed. You must start your identification process again.

The value response is higher than maximun value allowed

Currently, there is no monitoring program assigned through the Andalusia Health App. These programs are used, in certain patients and according to established criteria, for remote monitoring of certain health problems.
Right now, there is no monitoring records.
Here you can see a report of your latest measurements sorted by type.
Help is not available at this time. Please try again later

Currently you do not have any data registered in this section. The record of measurements over time is useful to see your evolution and, thus, to be able to detect small imbalances in your state of health and prevent possible complications.
There is no data to display in this graph.
Welcome to the Monitoring Programs section for remote monitoring of health problems through the Andalusia Health App
These Monitoring Programs are used, in certain patients and according to established criteria, for remote monitoring of certain health problems.
Grant this permission to enable video call communication with your healthcare professional.
Grant this permission to enable access to the camera and you can perform actions like taking photos or recording on it.
In order to have all the functionalities of the application, it is necessary to grant some permissions:
In this section, we explain the purpose of the sensitive permissions you grant to the app. In addition to explaining its use, we also indicate how we treat the data associated with said permissions.
Enable video and audio communication with healthcare professionals.

Certificates issued before February 1, 2022 and that are more than 270 days old since the last vaccination and are marked 2/2, will be interpreted as not having received a booster dose and will be reported as invalid, even though they may be. If this circumstance occurs, we recommend the citizen request a new certificate. More Info.
FOR EU DIGITAL COVID CERTIFICATE - VACCINATION
This information will be safely downloaded in the Andalusia Health App for offline use. Do you wish to continue?
This type of certificate already exists in the store. If you save this new certificate, you will delete the previous version of it. do you wish to continue?
An error has occurred trying to store your certificate. Please try again later.
Your certificate information has been successfully stored in the Andalusia Health App safely.

In this section of the Andalusia Health App you will be able to have all the COVID-19 certificates that you have previously downloaded for use without an internet connection. If your vaccination situation is modified, you will have to make a new download.
You are not registered in the user database of the Andalusian Health Service, necessary requirement to access the COVID-19 self-monitoring system
Set your own subscriptions and share them with other people.
Subscription type 1, Subscription type 2, Subscription type 3 ....

The specified email is not correct
The suscription you are trying to update does not exist at this time.
Your changes have not been saved. ¿Do you wish to continue?
You are going to accept this suscription. Are you sure?
You need to be able to access your phone\'s contacts to use this functionality. Do you want to go to settings to allow access?
Enables the contacts permission to be able to select a contact from the phonebook.
You are trying to share this suscription to a contact you have already shared it with.
You can\'t share this suscription to this contact because they have the same phone number as the one used for the main event.
The selected phone number is not valid
With AviSAS you decide what information related to your health processes, appointment reminders, diagnostic tests, etc. wants to be notified.
To access all the services offered by AviSAS, you must allow the Salud Andalucía App to access your contacts and thus be able to share the information on your processes with whomever you wish.

You have a specially protected record. We recommend that, instead of completing the questionnaire, you call Salud Responde or contact the professionals who care for you to ensure your protection. You have a specially protected record. We recommend that, instead of completing the questionnaire, you call Salud Responde or contact the professionals who care for you to ensure your protection.
In this section you will have at your disposal public and personalized forms to be able to carry out a closer follow-up of your health situation as well as your interests.
Right now, there is no forms records.
Right now, there is no forms recorded.
You are not currently assigned this form. Contact your healthcare professional for any clarification.
Start your form answer this questions.
You can complete the public forms in order to transmit your interests to the Andalusian Public Health System.
You will also be able to complete personalized forms that will allow you to have a closer follow-up of your health.
Select a minimun amount of %1$s choices
Select a minimun amount of %1$s choice
As you are not identified, you will send the current form anonymously, and you will not have access to it later. Do you want to continue?
The size of all attached files cannot exceed 2MB
You will exit the form and will not save the answers found. do you wish to continue?
Once accepted, the form will be registered and cannot be modified or deleted. Are you sure of the registered information?
An error occurred while submitting the form responses
The form has been submitted successfully
For this functionality to be available, you need to enable a security mechanism (biometrics, pattern, pin...) on your mobile device. You will be able to use it after changing its settings.
